Title: Setup Project Structure & Database
Body: Initialize FastAPI project. Configure SQLAlchemy `database.py`, `models/base.py`. Setup Alembic for migrations.

Title: Implement User Model & Migrations
Body: Create `User` model (email, username, hashed_password). Run `alembic revision --autogenerate`. Verify SQLite creation.

Title: Implement Authentication Utilities
Body: Install `passlib[bcrypt]`. Create `verify_password` and `get_password_hash` functions. Setup `python-jose` config.

Title: Create Auth API Endpoints
Body: Implement `POST /signup` and `POST /login`. Create `get_current_user` dependency for route protection.

Title: Write Unit Tests for Auth
Body: Create `tests/test_auth.py`. Test registration flow, login success, and 401 unauthorized access.

Title: Create Competition Model
Body: Define `Competition` table (name, status, format). Create Many-to-Many table `competition_players`. Run Migrations.

Title: Implement Competition CRUD
Body: Create endpoints: `POST /competitions`, `GET /competitions`, `GET /competitions/{id}`. Ensure only Auth users can create.

Title: Implement Inscription Logic (Join/Leave)
Body: Create `POST /competitions/{id}/join` and `DELETE /leave`. Validate that competition status is PLANNED before joining.

Title: Write Tests for Competitions
Body: Create `tests/test_competitions.py`. Verify user inscription and duplicate join prevention.

Title: Create Match Model
Body: Define `Match` table (white_id, black_id, result, pgn). Link to Competition. Run Migrations.

Title: Implement Round Robin Pairing Logic
Body: Write service function to generate all matches for a list of players. Create endpoint `POST /start` to trigger this.

Title: Implement Result Submission & Standings
Body: Create `POST /result` to save scores. Create `StandingsService` to calculate points (Win=1, Draw=0.5).

Title: Write Tests for Match Engine
Body: Create `tests/test_matchmaking.py`. detailed test: Start comp -> Check match count -> Submit result -> Check standings points.

Title: Add PGN Validation
Body: Integrate `python-chess` or regex to validate moves string in `pgn_blueprint` field.

Title: Refactor & CORS Configuration
Body: Move routes to `app/api/v1/routers`. Add `CORSMiddleware` for frontend integration. Clean up `main.py`.

Title: Dockerize Application
Body: Create `Dockerfile` and `docker-compose.yml` (Web + Postgres). Ensure app boots correctly in container.

Title: Final Integration Test
Body: Run full suite `pytest`. Verify all logic from Auth to Standings works in harmony.
